9 class Autocontrol:
10 
11  def __init__(self):
12  rospy.init_node("autocontrol")
13 
14  self.arduino = serial.Serial('/dev/ttyUSB0', 9600, bytesize=serial.EIGHTBITS, timeout=1)
15  self.serial_frame = {
16  "header": 0x55,
17  "len": 8,
18  "data": [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0],
19  "crc": 0
20  }
21  self.pub_hand = rospy.Publisher("/hand_angle", Int16, queue_size=1)
22 
23 
24  @staticmethod
25  def constrain(x, higher_limit, lower_limit):
26  if x > higher_limit: x = higher_limit
27  if x < lower_limit: x = lower_limit
28  return x
29 
30 
31  def run(self):
32  rate = rospy.Rate(10)
33 
34  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
35  forward_power = Autocontrol.constrain(rospy.get_param("forward")["power"], 100, -100)
36  up_power = Autocontrol.constrain(rospy.get_param("up")["power"], 100, -100)
37  self.serial_frame["data"][0] = up_power
38  self.serial_frame["data"][1] = forward_power
39  self.serial_frame["data"][2] = forward_power
40  self.serial_frame["data"][3] = up_power
41  self.serial_frame["data"][4] = up_power
42 
43  self.serial_frame["crc"] = 0
44  for i in range(self.serial_frame["len"]):
45  self.serial_frame["crc"] = self.serial_frame["crc"] ^ (int(self.serial_frame["data"][i]) & 0b11111111)
46 
47  print(self.serial_frame["data"])
48  msg = struct.pack(
49  "2B5b4B",
50  self.serial_frame["header"],
51  self.serial_frame["len"],
52  self.serial_frame["data"][0],
53  self.serial_frame["data"][1],
54  self.serial_frame["data"][2],
55  self.serial_frame["data"][3],
56  self.serial_frame["data"][4],
57  self.serial_frame["data"][5],
58  self.serial_frame["data"][6],
59  self.serial_frame["data"][7],
60  self.serial_frame["crc"]
61  )
62  self.arduino.write(msg)
63  self.pub_hand.publish(1484)
64  rate.sleep()
65 
66 
67 if __name__ == "__main__":
68  ctrl = Autocontrol()
69  try:
70  rospy.loginfo("START")
71  ctrl.run()
72 
73  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
74  pass
